general_info.summary: This document outlines a rubric for assessing fortnightly milestones for the "MPV to Early Traction Stage," detailing criteria and scoring for digital media presence, customer feedback mechanisms, market size and go-to-market strategy, business model clarity, financial planning, market strategy, and pitch deck preparation. Each criterion is broken down into four levels: Below Average, Average, Good, and Very Good, with specific indicators provided for each level to guide evaluation.
